## Exercise 1

Find the mean alcohol content:

```{webr}
#| exercise: ex_1
#| exercise.setup: ex_all
Result=______(DataWine$alcohol) 
cat("The avg. alcohol in the wines is:", ______) 
```

::: {.hint exercise="ex_1"}
Great hint. Ha,ha.
:::


::: {.solution exercise="ex_1"}
Here is the Solution from CL


```{webr}
#| exercise: ex_1
#| solution: true
Result=mean(DataWine$alcohol) #<1>
cat("The avg. alcohol in the wines is:", Result) #<2>
```
